author: Nicola B
title: Perfect location, clean and tidy hotel
text: After a shaky start (we checked in & were given keys to a room someone hadn't entirely checked out of...!) our stay at the Novotel was a comfortable and enjoyable one. Our room was of decent size, well-equipped with a safe & iron, clean, comfortable and had a great shower. The staff are friendly and helpful, although we asked the concierge for some different advice (restaurant recommendations, arranging an airport transfer & getting tickets to local events) and were basically directed towards the internet to sort for ourselves. Location is the big winner here - for the very reasonable price we paid for a 5 night stay, the hotel is a fantastic base for exploring Manhattan. Would recommend - good value for money.
